content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: A unique partnership between the University, NHS, business and local government, it will form an important part of the Greater Manchester health innovation ecosystem, working together to translate world-leading research into new products and services.
title: Christabel Pankhurst Institute

content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: The Research and Innovation (R&I) Health Accelerator is an ERDF (European Regional Development Fund) part-funded project delivered by Health Innovation Manchester, The University of Manchester, The University of Manchester Innovation Factory, Manchester City Council and Bionow.
title: ERDF R&I Health Accelerator

content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: The Integrated Diagnostics for Early Detection of Liver Disease – or ID LIVER consortium – will develop new software integrating patient and diagnostic data from different diagnostic tests.
title: ID LIVER

content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: The Manchester University NHS Foundation Trust Clinical Data Science Unit (CDSU) will work with colleagues from across academia and healthcare on cutting edge data science projects that will transform the delivery of healthcare across the NHS.
title: MFT Clinical Data Science Unit

content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: CRUK RadNet is a network of centres of excellence and state-of-the-art facilities working with the research community to tackle the major challenges in radiobiology and radiation oncology.
title: RadNet

content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: In partnership with the Christie NHS Foundation Trust we are developing informatics solutions to deliver world-class cancer treatment.
title: The Christie Hospital

content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: The GM Care Record allows workers in health or social care, easy access to patient information that is critical to support decision-making about patient care and treatment.
title: The Greater Manchester Care Record

content: What are the implications for University-based researchers?
summary: UK Coronavirus Immunology Consortium
title: UK-CIC
